title: WTT: T222 Nemo Leibold for another short print
author: x2drich2000

posts.post_title: WTT: T222 Nemo Leibold for another short print
posts.post_content:
Got doubles of short print Nemo Leibold and looking to add another harder shortprint that I need preferable either either John Henry or JC Smith in any condition.  Also have an extra really low grade Lobert I can add to the deal.
